word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指大破坏、痛苦或伤亡。
普通用词，多批较为严重的不幸，强调不幸多由外界因素所致。
多指个人的不幸，比disaster严重，强调灾难引起的悲痛以及对于损失的感觉。
语气最强，指可怕的灾难，强调最终的结局。

word_group.brief_definition: 自然灾害；自然灾难；天然灾害
灾区；混乱的地方；失败的人
灾难恢复；灾害恢复；灾后恢复
灾害响应；灾害应对；灾难反应
大规模灾害；大型灾害；大规模灾难
矿区灾害；矿井灾害；煤矿灾难
公共关系危机；公共关系灾难

bilingual.source: How did people there react to the disaster?
bilingual.target: 那里的人们对灾难有什么反应？

bilingual.source: Although we are surrounded by reminders of the disaster.
bilingual.target: 尽管我们被灾难的提醒包围着。

bilingual.source: Many people have no idea what to do when a disaster strikes.
bilingual.target: 许多人不知道灾难发生时该怎么办。

bilingual.source: Carlos signed up for the class, but it was just another disaster.
bilingual.target: 卡洛斯报名参加了课程，但这只是另一个灾难。

bilingual.source: Do some research online and find a story about hope in the face of disaster.
bilingual.target: 在线做一些研究，找到一个关于灾难面前希望的故事。

bilingual.source: Now that it's hard to avoid a disaster on Earth, perhaps I should start thinking about moving to space.
bilingual.target: 既然在地球上难以避免灾难，也许我应该开始考虑搬到太空。

bilingual.source: The pilot, Chesley Sullenberger, had to make a quick decision to avoid a terrible disaster.
bilingual.target: 飞行员切斯利·萨伦伯格不得不迅速做出决定以避免一场可怕的灾难。

bilingual.source: Although we are surrounded by reminders of the disaster, we are working together to rebuild our homes and our lives.
bilingual.target: 尽管我们被灾难的提醒包围着，但我们正在一起努力重建我们的家园和生活。
战争对每个人都是一场灾难。
他们对这场灾难感到悲痛。

list.abstract: disaster灾难包括自然灾难和人为灾难。自然灾难是指地震，洪涝，海啸，泥石流，森林自燃，干旱等等。人为灾难包括人为放火，饥荒等等。

yingyinNormal.en: What if there's a disaster that destroys all the USB ports?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那要是所有的USB接口都在灾难中坏掉了呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we have to be prepared for that. I mean, of course, politically, it would be a disaster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须有所准备，当然了，从政治角度讲，这简直是灾难。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, we haven't been anywhere together since Carrie and Big's wedding blowup honeymoon disaster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从凯莉和大人物的蜜月灾难之后，我们就没一起去过什么地方。

yingyinNormal.en: I shot you for good reason. You were leading us into disaster. I was giving clear, concise orders.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有充分的理由。你正把我们引向灾难之中。我的命令清晰而且明确。

yingyinNormal.en: Since never. The captain is being charged with embezzlement and fraud. This is an absolute disaster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一直都没有，直到上校因挪用公款和诈骗被起诉了，这完全是个灾难。

yingyinNormal.en: There's nothing to figure out, the whole thing's a disaster. What does this mean, Riley? How is this great?
yingyinNormal.zh: 没什么好想的了，整件事就是个灾难。这是什么意思，莱丽？这个怎么好了？

yingyinNormal.en: Having a roommate can be a recipe for disaster, but it also has a potential for being the greatest friendship you've ever had.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想要获得一场灾难，秘诀就是，去弄个室友来，但这也有可能让你获得最好的友谊。

yingyinNormal.en: Sameen risked everything at the Stock Exchange, not just to save our lives, but to pull the whole world back from the brink of disaster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 萨姆恩在证交所付出了一切，不仅救了我们的命，还把整个世界从灾难边缘拉回来。

yingyinNormal.en: Wouldn't you rather bring Sheldon? I would, but the last wedding we went to was a disaster. He behaved like a child the entire time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你带谢尔顿去不是更好吗？我也想，可我俩上次一起去参加的婚礼简直是场灾难，他整场婚礼就像是个小孩一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this party's a disaster. Don't blame the party! You know how many favors I had to call in with my bounce house guy to get Wonder Woman? Is that Wonder Woman?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这派对简直是灾难。别怪派对啊！你知道我托了多少关系才租到神奇女侠的蹦跳城堡吗？那是神奇女侠吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Disaster. The brakes don't work. Nice and easy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 惨不忍睹，刹车失灵了。放轻松点。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Who's the disaster with the scarf? Her son, Pepito.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个戴围巾的是个什么鬼？她儿子，佩皮托。

yingyinNormal.en: Just stop. Every time you step outside, disaster follows.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别说了，你每次一出去就会惹祸。

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe? Phoebe? Look, this is a disaster. Can't I please just go?
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比？菲比，这真是人间地狱，我走了好不好？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, there was a disaster in shipping and I've got to get this order in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 运货出了大问题，我得把这批货弄到。

yingyinNormal.en: I had no idea all our relationships were such a disaster. Boy, you're good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真没想到我们这些人的感情生活也是一团乱麻。唉呀妈呀，你真厉害呀。

yingyinNormal.en: When good things happen, do they stay good, or does a little bit of good just bring a bigger disaster?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当好运降临，它们是会延续呢？还是一点点好运后，情况就急转直下？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm worried about the funding. The Disaster Relief Fund has been depleted by a third since you launched AmWorks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很担心资金问题。美就法启动后，联邦应急管理局赈灾基金耗掉了三分之一。

yingyinNormal.en: It's important to understand because it's what allowed a housing crisis to become a nationwide economic disaster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是很重要的概念，因为它会让房地产危机成为全国金融危机。

yingyinNormal.en: This sandwich is an unmitigated disaster. I asked for turkey and roast beef with lettuce and Swiss on whole wheat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这三明治真是个彻底的失败品，我点的是火鸡和烤牛肉全麦上放生菜和芝士。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden event, such as an accident or a natural catastrophe, that causes great damage or loss of life

examination_example.sentence: You can insure yourself against the risk of unemployment and receive unconditional payments if the <highlight>disaster</highlight> happens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果发生灾难，你能为自己投保失业险并得到无条件赔付。

examination_example.sentence: No one tries harder than the jobless to find silver linings in this national economic <highlight>disaster</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失业者比任何人都更努力地在这场国家经济灾难中寻找一线希望。

v. 分发；分配；周延；分布；分销；批发；拆（版）还字；分散；通过网络分布于多台计算机的
v. 扰乱；打扰；破坏；骚扰；弄醒；妨碍…休息；使担心

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指人为和自然力所造成突然的或出人意料的损失或不幸，含“天灾人祸”之意。
指因人的失误而造成的不幸或因重大事故给带来的损失，往往强调肉体或物质上不幸，一般用语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden event, such as an accident or a natural catastrophe, that causes great damage or loss of life

examination_example.sentence: A greater <highlight>disaster</highlight> was averted by members of the Paris fire brigade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎消防队成员避免了一场更大的灾难。

examination_example.sentence: It's the mother of all <highlight>disaster</highlight> drills for what could be the worst <highlight>disaster</highlight> in American history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是所有灾难演习的源头，可能是美国历史上最严重的灾难。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指个人的不幸, 比 disaster 严重, 强调灾难引起的悲痛以及对于损失的感觉。
语气最强, 指可怕的灾难, 强调最终的结局。
普通用词, 指大破坏、痛苦或伤亡。
普通用词, 多批较为严重的不幸, 强调不幸多由外界因素所致。
着重不可避免和后果严重。
指因贫穷、不幸或屈辱等外部因素给人造成精神痛苦、烦恼或肉体折磨, 令人同情和可怜。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: a sudden event; such as an accident or a natural catastrophe; that causes great damage or loss of life

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes, however, testing out a new idea can lead to <highlight>disaster</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而有时，测试一个新想法可能会导致灾难。
但是灾难仍然会伤害我们。

examination_example.sentence: Private courier companies, which have more dollars to spend, use their expertise in logistics to help revitalize damaged areas after a <highlight>disaster</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 私人快递公司有更多的钱可以使用，他们利用自己在物流方面的专业知识来帮助灾后重建受损地区。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden event, such as an accident or a natural catastrophe, that causes great damage or loss of life

examination_example.sentence: From 2000 to 2019, there were 7,348 major <highlight>disasters</highlight> around the world, resulting in USD 2,970 billion in economic loss.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2000年至2019年，全球共发生7348起重大灾害，造成29700亿美元的经济损失。

examination_example.sentence: The findings show a critical need to invest in <highlight>disaster</highlight> prevention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 调查结果显示，亟需投资于防灾。

examination_example.sentence: By tracking people's e-mails and online posts, scientists have found that good news can spread faster and farther than <highlight>disasters</highlight> and sob stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过追踪人们的电子邮件和网上帖子，科学家们发现，好消息比灾难和悲情故事传播得更快、更远。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指个人的不幸，比 disaster 严重，强调灾难引起的悲痛以及对于损失的感觉。
语气最强，指可怕的灾难，强调最终的结局。
普通用词，指大破坏、痛苦或伤亡。
普通用词，多批较为严重的不幸，强调不幸多由外界因素所致。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden event, such as an accident or a natural catastrophe, that causes great damage or loss of life

examination_example.sentence: Several natural <highlight>disasters</highlight> (天灾) hit China in the 1960s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪60年代，中国发生了几次天灾。

examination_example.sentence: Unexpected <highlight>disasters</highlight> (灾难) would hit the earth again and again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 意想不到的灾难会一次又一次地袭击地球。

examination_example.sentence: Drinking chrysanthemum is regarded as a way to prevent <highlight>disasters</highlight> and bad things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 喝菊花茶被认为是一种预防灾难和坏事的方法。
